description: /b/Minecraft Instrument Musical Interface/b/ (or /b/MIMI/b/) adds /6/MIDI compatible instruments/6/.
If you don't know what that means, you can still /6/play/6/ them normally /6/with your keyboard/6/. Otherwise, you may /6/plug in a MIDI device/6/.
A /b/Transmitter/b/ will allow you to /6/play automatically/6/ off of a /b/MIDI file/b/.
There are many instruments and many other tools to help you make a grand orchestra.
